item.description:
Hello,

There are 2 spots left for the event. The registration will be closed on Thursday evening.

Regards,

Mary



Hello All,

It sounded like people don't know where the club is. Here is the info about the location:

Atkinson Resort & Country Club
85 Country Club Drive
Atkinson, NH 03811
phone: (603) 362-8700 - fax: (603) 362-5727
e-mail: info@atkinsoncc.com
web: www.atkinsonresort.com


It is right at the border line between MA and NH. It is about 50-60 minutes drive from Boston. So no one should need any hotels or sort to play this event. One can use I-93 or I-495 to get there.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be somewhere near the pro shop

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Atkinson CC
